column4: Help. I am trying to format my computer with DBAN and start fresh.  GRUB loads up before the bootdisk is noticed.  What can I do to format entirely?
change your boot order in the bios..
but if you are just 'starting fresh' you dont need dban, and installer cd will do what you need
esc, f1, f2, f11, f12... try them all, just run your finger across the whole top row
